-e ---

𐁁-𐀼 ai-za αἶγες 𓌡𓏤𓂝𓃶 goat 羔 Geiß

𐁁 aiⁿ wegen αἶγες 𓋹𓈖𓐍 Ankh ⇔ once ancient Eins 𓌡𓏤𓂝𓃶
𐁁 ᶢai ᵞai ˠai wegen Geiß goat 羔
𐁁 ᵞai wegen chaisse chair

𐁁 goat ⇔ lamb lambda 𐘠 Λ (Linear A) Lady 𐁑 woman VAmme ⚢

𐁁 eigen? Eugen?

Very rare Linear B letter, only three attested words:
𐁁-𐀏-𐀭-𐀔 ai-ka-sa-ma points heads
𐁁-𐀭 ai-sa portion
𐁁-𐀼 ai-za αἶγες goat
